name: Typeform to HubSpot: AI-Enriched & Scored Leads with GPT-4o-mini

user.name: Avkash Kakdiya
user.bio:
üöÄ Founder of iTechNotion ‚Äî we build custom AI-powered automation workflows for startups, agencies, and founders.
üí° Specializing in agentic AI systems, content automation, sales funnels, and digital workers.

üì¨ Let‚Äôs automate what slows you down.

description:
### How it works
This workflow starts whenever a new lead is submitted through Typeform. It cleans and stores the raw lead data, checks if the email is business-related (not Gmail), and then uses AI to enrich the lead with company details. After enrichment, the workflow scores the lead with AI, updates your HubSpot CRM, and saves everything neatly into Google Sheets for tracking and reporting.

### Step-by-step

**Capture New Lead**

- Triggered by a new Typeform submission.

- Collects basic details: Name, Email, Phone, and Message.

- Saves raw lead data into a Google Sheet for backup.

- Stores the basic info in Airtable (avoids duplicates by email).

**Format & Filter Leads**

- Formats the incoming data into a clean structure.

- Filters out non-business emails (e.g., Gmail) so only qualified leads continue.

**Enrich Company Information**

- Uses AI (GPT-4o-mini) to enrich the lead‚Äôs company data based on email domain.

- Returns details like: Company Name, Industry, Headquarters, Employee Count, Website, LinkedIn, and Description.

- Merges this information with the original lead profile and adds metadata (timestamp, workflow ID).

**Score the Lead**

- AI analyzes the enriched profile and assigns a lead score (1‚Äì10).

- Scoring considers industry fit, company size, contact source, and domain reputation.

**Update CRM & Sheets**

- Sends the enriched lead with score to HubSpot CRM.

- Updates company details, contact info, and custom properties (lead_score, LinkedIn, description).

- Logs the fully enriched lead in a Google Sheet for tracking.

### Why use this?

- Automatically enriches and scores every incoming lead.

- Filters out low-value (non-business) emails before wasting CRM space.

- Keeps HubSpot CRM up to date with the latest company and contact info.

- Maintains both raw and enriched lead data in Google Sheets for easy reporting.

- Saves your team hours of manual research and ensures consistent, AI-driven lead qualification.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.content:
## üìõ Filter Non-Business Emails
Filters out Gmail-based or personal emails.

Allows only leads with non gmail.com (business) domains to proceed for enrichment.

## üí¨ LLM (OpenAI / Claude)
Supplies the GPT-4o-mini model to the downstream agent node.

## üè¢ Enrich Company Info (AI)
AI agent enriches company data using domain:

Fields returned: company_name, industry, headquarters, employee_count, website, linkedin, description.

## ü™Ñ Merge Enriched Lead Profile
Merges formatted lead + enriched company data.

Adds metadata: enrichment timestamp & workflow ID.

Ensures consistent field structure for scoring and downstream nodes.

parameters.text:
=You are a company research assistant. I will give you a domain name.

Here's the domain: {{ $json.domain }}

Your task is to return a JSON object with the following details about the company:

company_name: Full name of the company

industry: The primary industry the company belongs to

headquarters: City and country of the company headquarters

employee_count: Approximate number of employees (numeric or range)

website: Official website URL

linkedin: LinkedIn profile link (if available)

description: 1-2 sentence summary of the company and what it does

Only use verified, credible information. Respond only in JSON.

parameters.content:
**Triggered on new Typeform submission. Captures: Name, Email, Phone, Message.**

## üîß Format Incoming Data
Cleans data from Typeform. Extracts key fields, tags source, checks if email is business.

## üìÑ Log Raw Lead
Saves raw lead data to Google Sheet for backup.

## üì¶ Store Basic Info (Airtable)
Upserts lead into Airtable by Email to prevent duplicates.

## üéØ AI Lead Scorer

Evaluates lead quality based on:

Company metadata
Industry fit
Contact source
Domain type

Returns a lead score (1‚Äì10).

## üì® Send to HubSpot CRM

Creates or updates a contact in HubSpot.

Sends:

Name, Email, Phone, Website
Company Description, LinkedIn, Country, Industry
Custom Properties:
lead_score
company_s_linkedin
company_descreption

## üìä Save Enriched Lead

Logs fully enriched and scored lead into Sheet of:

Company's Google Spreadsheet.

Columns:

Contact Info: Name, Email, Phone, Message

Company Info: Name, Industry, Size, Website, HQ, LinkedIn

Lead Score
